title: Coast to Coast Radio Program! Commercial Free! Aug 6th thru Aug
description:
Sorry people, problems with the old computer! Anyway, here are another 13 broadcasts of Coast to Coast AM! I hope you all enjoy and share the wealth. Thanks in advance to all the seeders. Until we meet again sometime in the near or far future. Stokeman Out......

Wednesday August 6th, 2008
Secret Societies, Symbolism & the Occult
Researcher of the occult Jordan Maxwell was joined by alternative historian Michael Tsarion for a discussion on secret societies, symbols, and astro-theology. Religion is incorporated into an economic and political movement, Maxwell declared, and the... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Michael Tsarion, Jordan Maxwell, Dr. Paul Moller, Bruce Calkins

Thursday August 7th, 2008
Alternative Health Special
Author and researcher Christian Wilde reported on alternative approaches to treating heart disease. In the third hour, he was joined by holistic expert Gabriel Cousens, MD, and raw food authority David Wolfe. Wilde noted that turmeric has been shown to... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Christian Wilde, Dr. Gabriel Cousens, David Wolfe, Alex Jones

Friday August 8th, 2008
&#039;Prank&#039; Calls
During Open Lines, George offered a special topic line for people who have ever played a prank on someone or had a prank played on them. Christina in Dallas said she once snuck into the house of an enemy and placed an incredibly bad smelling Japanese... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Open Lines, Glynis McCants

Saturday August 9th, 2008
Number Crunching
Yale Law and Business Professor Ian Ayres discussed his book Super Crunchers as well as all the ways data mining and number crunching are affecting our lives today. Private corporations have amassed petabytes* of data about individuals, Ayres explained,... 
Host: Ian Punnett
Guest(s): Ian Ayres, Galen Cook

Sunday August 10th, 2008
Psychology of Disaster
For the first 2Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â½ hours, journalist Amanda Ripley discussed the psychology of disaster response and her new book, The Unthinkable. When a person encounters a disastrous circumstance they may first react with disbelief or denial, as the brain tries to... 
Host: Ian Punnett
Guest(s): Amanda Ripley

Monday August 11th, 2008
Immigration & Overpopulation
Journalist and teacher, Frosty Wooldridge discussed his work campaigning against illegal immigration and the ramifications of adding 100 million people to the U.S. population by 2035. This pending overpopulation in America stems from both legal and illegal... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Frosty Wooldridge, John M. Curtis

Tuesday August 12th, 2008
The Afterlife & Contact w/the Dead
Author Craig Hogan shared his research into contact with the dead, and the powers of the mind. The human mind exists independently of the brain, he argued, citing remote viewing ability as an example of how the mind can see at a great distance. During... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Craig Hogan, Loren Coleman

Wednesday August 13th, 2008
Flatwoods UFO Case & Shootdowns
Ufologists Stanton Friedman and Frank Feschino discussed the &#039;Flatwoods Monster&#039; encounter, which took place on Sept. 12, 1952, during what they believe was the biggest UFO flap in US history. Witnesses said they saw a large oval-shaped craft set down... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Stanton Friedman, Frank Feschino, Joe Kovacs, Katherine Albrecht

Thursday August 14th, 2008
The 4th Reich in America
Journalist and author Jim Marrs discussed his new book The Rise of the Fourth Reich, which posits that Nazi ideology threatens to overtake America. This authoritarian ideology-- that the end justifies the means, is practiced by various secret societiesÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Jim Marrs, James McCanney

Friday August 15th, 2008
&#039;Bigfoot&#039; Press Conference Update
Researcher Ruben Uriarte appeared briefly at the start of the program to comment on Friday&#039;s lackluster &#039;Bigfoot&#039; news conference (video) held by Matt Whitton, Rick Dyer, and a self-proclaimed Sasquatch hunter. Uriarte was immediately followed by mask... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Loren Coleman, Open Lines

Saturday August 16th, 2008
Anthony "Gaspipe" Casso
Ian spoke with crime expert Philip Carlo, who shared stories from his research into organized crime and discussed his latest work, Gaspipe: Confessions of a Mafia Boss. Carlo said he grew up in Bensonhurst, Brooklyn, where he was a neighbor of...
Host: Ian Punnett
Guest(s): Philip Carlo, Dr. Jeffrey Meldrum

Sunday August 17th, 2008
Slovakia Artifact & Marley Woods
UFO researcher Ted Phillips spoke about his investigations into a huge Slovakia artifact (Project Moonshaft) and the Marley Woods sightings. During WW II, Tony Horak said he was hiding in a cave in the Tatra Mountains in Slovakia, and subsequently discovered... 
Host: George Knapp
Guest(s): Ted Phillips

Monday August 18th, 2008
The Dark Star & Planet X
Author and researcher Andy Lloyd discussed the scientific evidence for a "dark star" which could have a Planet X, or Nibiru (as written about by Zecharia Sitchin) in its orbit. Lloyd suggested that a sub-brown dwarf, which is somewhere between a gas... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Andy Lloyd, Alex Jones, Col. John Alexander
